name: obtain(withRights:flags:environment:authorizedRights:)
desc: Authorizes and preauthorizes rights to access a privileged operation and returns the granted rights.
declaration:
func obtain(withRights rights: UnsafePointer<AuthorizationRights>!, 
      flags: AuthorizationFlags, 
environment: UnsafePointer<AuthorizationEnvironment>!, 
authorizedRights: UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutablePointer<AuthorizationRights>?>!) throws
